trans-unit.source: Defines the attribute that controls use to identify string properties containing URL values.
trans-unit.target: 定義控制項使用的屬性來識別包含 URL 值的字串屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The UrlPropertyAttribute attribute is an attribute applied to a control property that represents a URL.
trans-unit.target: UrlPropertyAttribute 屬性會套用至代表 URL 的控制項屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In addition to marking a string property as representing a URL, the UrlPropertyAttribute attribute defines the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A> property that identifies specific file types that can be used to filter against the property.
trans-unit.target: 除了將標示為表示 URL 的字串屬性，定義 UrlPropertyAttribute 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A>識別可用來對屬性篩選的特定檔案類型的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的預設執行個體的<xref href="System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A default instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute> class is initialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A> property set to the value "*.\*".
trans-unit.target: 預設執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute>類別會使用初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A>屬性設定為值"*。\*"。</xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute"></xref> class, setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter*> property to the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute"></xref>類別，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter*>屬性指定的字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter*>

trans-unit.source: An instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute> class created with this constructor is initialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A> property set to `filter`.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute>使用這個建構函式建立的類別會使用初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A>屬性設定為`filter`。</xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A file filter associated with the URL-specific property.
trans-unit.target: 與 URL 特定屬性關聯的檔案篩選器。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> to compare with this instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>比較與這個執行個體或 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if obj equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 具有相同的類型和值，這個執行個體; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Gets a file filter associated with the URL-specific property.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 URL 特定屬性關聯的檔案篩選器。

trans-unit.source: A designer provides a filter in file selectors based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具提供的檔案為基礎的選取器中的篩選條件<xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: By default, it is initialized to "*.\*", which specifies all files with a file extension.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，它會初始化為"*。\*"，指定所有檔案與檔案副檔名。

trans-unit.source: You can set the filter for more specific file types; for example, the filter "\*.aspx" indicates that only ASP.NET files are represented by the URL-specific property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定篩選器更特定的檔案類型。例如，篩選器"\*.aspx 」 表示只有 ASP.NET 檔案都由 URL 特定屬性。

trans-unit.source: A file filter associated with the URL-specific property.
trans-unit.target: 與 URL 特定屬性關聯的檔案篩選器。

trans-unit.source: The default is "*.\*".
Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。
